body_html: Study export_inference_graph.py example in slim folder for exporting inference graph. After that you have to combine model with the trained variables using tensorflow freeze_graph tool (ie call for example 'python3 -m tensorflow.python.tools.freeze_graph' with suitable input_graph and checkopoint).
body_text: Study export_inference_graph.py example in slim folder for exporting inference graph. After that you have to combine model with the trained variables using tensorflow freeze_graph tool (ie call for example 'python3 -m tensorflow.python.tools.freeze_graph' with suitable input_graph and checkopoint).
body: Study export_inference_graph.py example in slim folder for exporting inference graph. After that you have to combine model with the trained variables using tensorflow freeze_graph tool (ie call for example 'python3 -m tensorflow.python.tools.freeze_graph' with suitable input_graph and checkopoint).
